title: Topic 002 Question 020
body: A company has two virtual networks (VNets) that are configured to use peering. Several Azure virtual machines are connected to each network. An on-premises network is connected to one of the VNets by using Azure VPN Gateway.
An administrator reports that communication between applications across the VNets is failing.
You need to troubleshoot the issue.
Which two features can you use to achieve the goal? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
